A bloodsucker; a person who takes without giving back.
definitions.example: He's a regular gadfly and takes advantage of his friend's generosity.

definitions.definition: The reappearance of an ancestral characteristic in an organism after several generations of absence.
The recurrence or reversion to a past behaviour, method, characteristic or style after a long period of absence.
Reversion to past primitive behavior, especially violence.
A wound, such as a bruise, in which the skin is not broken, often having broken blood vessels and discolouration.
The act of bruising.
Exhibiting parsimony; sparing in the expenditure of money; frugal to excess.
Using a minimal number of assumptions, steps, or conjectures.
Not conceding many goals.
Sweet, especially when describing voice or tones; melodious.
Generally pleasing; agreeable.
Sweet to the taste.
To take (something) up or on again.
To repeat or resume an action
definitions.example: The aging actress played the role she played in her youth, as if to reprise it.

definitions.definition: To recompense; to pay.
(pharmaceutical effect) capable of soothing or eliminating pain
Soothing or relaxing
definitions.example: Classical music is rather anodyne.

definitions.definition: (by extension) noncontentious, blandly agreeable, unlikely to cause offence or debate
Deeply thoughtful; preoccupied
Perplexed and bewildered
